Name: Checkerboard Collection
About the game: Checkerboard Collection is a collection of classic turn-based strategy board games played on a checkerboard. The initial release includes the beloved game of checkers, but more games will be added in the future. Challenge yourself against cunning AI opponents or go head-to-head with friends in various game modes. Master the art of strategy and tactics as you excel at each game. Key Features: Classic turn-based board games played on a checkerboard Play against AI or friends in different game modes Minimalist design that allows users to focus on the game 2D visuals Undo-redo availability
